name: Pumpkin Spice Healthy Bran Muffins
author: Tim
summary: A fall twist on a delicious and healthy breakfast favorite.
ingredients: 3 cups wheat bran cereal (such as Kellogg's® All-Bran™)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line 2 muffin tins with paper liners
Place raisins in a microwave-safe bowl; cover with water
Microwave on high until plump, about 70 seconds
Beat milk and eggs together in a bowl; mix in bran cereal
Let stand until cereal softens, about 5 minutes
Mix raisins, canned pumpkin, honey, apples, and butter gently into the cereal mixture
Add flour, baking soda, pumpkin spice, and baking powder; mix batter gently until combined
Spoon batter into the lined muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 20 minutes
Transfer muffins to a cooling rack; let cool for 40 minutes
